TextView.android:text: There are many different types of financial models. the following list will outline the top 10 most common models used in corporate finance by financial modeling professionals: Three Statement Model, Discounted Cash Flow (DCF) Model, Merger Model, Initial Public Offering (IPO) Model, Leveraged Buyout (LBO) Model, Sum of the Parts Model, Consolidation Model, Budget Model, Forecasting Model, Option Pricing Model.
